mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, real_name, gender, birth_date, phone, email, address, create_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{password}, real_name = #{realName}, gender = #{gender}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address} WHERE id = #{id}
